properties.entry: SELECT * FROM REPORT R WHERE R.REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT REPORT_ANSWER FROM REPORT_HISTORY WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
UPDATE OWNER_INFO SET OWNER_WITHDRAW_YN = 'Y' , OWNER_WITHDATE = SYSDATE WHERE OWNER_NO = ?

SELECT REQUEST_NO , REQUEST_START , REQUEST_END , REQUEST_DATE , R.ACCOMO_NO , RESPONSE_YN , A.ACCOMO_NAME FROM REQUEST_TAX_BILL R JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON(R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) WHERE A.OWNER_NO = ?
SELECT ACCOMO_NO FROM ACCOMO_INFO WHERE ACCOMO_NAME = ? AND OWNER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REQUEST_TAX_BILL VALUES ( SEQUENCE_REQUEST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , DEFAULT )
